overview: Zahra, a third year student at Rodiatul Jannah boarding school, has always been a model student who has many achievements in school. Zahra is willing to obey any orders from Ustad Jaelani, her teacher, to get grades. Including the task of taking care of a new student who is famous for being naughty named Yolanda, and the task of inviting the students to perform the Qorin ritual. After the two served the task, Zahra began to get terror and mystical things. Zahra and the other students who performed the ritual of summoning Qorin, began to be haunted by the figure of a genie that resembled each of them. The arrival of the Qorin jinn made them commit unimaginable sins, and their lives were taken over by the Qorin Jin.
title: Qorin
